pma:database.name: dormnet119
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `jail` ( `IP` varchar(39) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `Reason` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `Start_time` datetime NOT NULL, `End_time` datetime NOT NULL, `Operator` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `__EXT1__` int(1) NOT NULL, `__EXT2__` int(1) NOT NULL, `__EXT3__` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`IP`), UNIQUE KEY `IP` (`IP`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

CREATE TABLE `repair` ( `id` smallint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `Serial_Number` varchar(5) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `who_asked_(ip_name)` varchar(39) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `content` varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `message_to_user` varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `start_at` datetime NOT NULL, `done?` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `Serial_Number` (`Serial_Number`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;
